title: Figolla
ingredients: ['For the sweet shortcrust pastry', '480g plain flour', '300g butter or margarine', '1 lemon zest', '2 eggs', '120g caster sugar', 'For the filling', '300g ground almonds', '220g caster sugar', '4 egg whites', 'grated rind of 1 lemon', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 drop almond extract']
